thread.title: Smitten Mark Wright praises wife Michelle Keegan after watching her dazzle in Tina and Bobby
thread.title_full: Smitten Mark Wright praises wife Michelle Keegan after watching her dazzle in Tina and Bobby

author: Nicola Agius
title: Smitten Mark Wright praises wife Michelle Keegan after watching her dazzle in Tina and Bobby
text:
Smitten Mark Wright praises wife Michelle Keegan after watching her dazzle in Tina and Bobby The TOWIE hunk was blown away by the star's performance Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Raunchy scenes between Michelle Keegan and Lorne MacFadyen Share this video Get celebs   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Mark Wright had nothing praise for Michelle Keegan after watching her in Tina and Bobby. 
Fans had wondered what he would think of the mini drama given the kissing scenes his wife had with actor Lorne MacFadyen - who plays her on-screen husband Bobby Moore. 
However, judging by his reaction on Twitter, the reality hunk was blown away by the first instalment of the ITV series. 
"She's just special #Tina&Bobby #wow #loveit," he wrote. 
Tina and Bobby had barely started before fans were heaping their praise on the new ITV drama. Read More Michelle Keegan reveals the real reason why she wanted to star in Tina and Bobby 
The series - which started on Friday night and follows the story of legendary footballer Bobby Moore and his wife Tina Dean - got off to a great start, with viewers gushing over the programme before the first ad break. 
After a case of love at first sight, fans watched as the character's tied the knot and started their life together - and they couldn't get enough of it. 
"I already love #TinaAndBobby," tweeted one viewer. Michelle Keegan and Mark Wright (Photo: Getty Images) 
Another added: "Loving #TinaAndBobby already @michkeegan is such a good actress well done (sic)" Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
